description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Hej! Det her er MobilePay. Du ved den der app, der gør betaling meget, meget nemt: Send penge til en ven (eller én, du ikke kender, hvis du er mere til det), betal i butikker, på nettet eller i andre apps. Og det er langt fra det eneste, du kan.

Du kan også bruge MobilePay til at: 
• anmode om penge
• modtage penge
• betale dine regninger
• have faste betalingsaftaler
• dele udgifter i en gruppe
• samle penge ind med box
• sende pengegaver (på planlagte tidspunkter) pakket ind i digitalt gavepapir

Fik vi sagt, at det er helt sikkert at sende penge og betale med MobilePay? Hvis ikke det er meget, meget nemt, ja, så ved vi snart ikke …

Det eneste, du skal have (udover lov af dine forældre, hvis du er under 18), er et betalingskort fra og en konto i en dansk bank – og så et telefonnummer, en e-mailadresse og MitID.

Og husk, at appen her kun er lavet til privat brug – så nu ikke noget med at lege butik :) Men hvis du gerne vil bruge os til det, så kan du selvfølgelig også det – så skal du bare have en erhvervsaftale. Det kan du heldigvis meget nemt få. Læs mere om det og meget andet på mobilepay.dk.

MobilePay er lavet i Norden med kærlighed for forenkling, så den er selvfølgelig tilgængelig på både dansk, engelsk, svensk, finsk og to slags norsk.

Welcome to Endavu: Denmark's new investing app. Until now, investing has been difficult, expensive, and boring. We have created Endavu to change that. We hope you enjoy using our platform!


"BEST-IN-TEST" BY THE DANISH CONSUMER COUNCIL

With outstanding ratings, we are named the best platform in Denmark by the Danish Consumer Council (Forbrugerrådet Tænk), which has conducted a large comparison across Danish investment platforms.


COMMISSION FREE INVESTING

We have been awarded the title as the cheapest platform in Denmark. Invest in US stocks with 0 DKK in commission. The less you pay to invest, the more you have invested.


THE BROADEST SELECTION

With over 30,000 stocks & ETFs from more than 28 countries, we offer you the widest selection so you won't go home empty handed.


FRACTIONAL SHARES

Invest precisely the amount you want. Is a stock too expensive? Simply buy a fraction. 
This makes it easy to get started, and, importantly, build a diversified portfolio.


TRADE WHENEVER YOU WANT

Got an idea? Act on it instantly. With extended market hours, you can trade nearly any time you’re awake.


REGULATED BY THE FINANCIAL SUPERVISORY AUTHORITY

As an investment platform, we are rigorously regulated by the Danish Financial Supervisory Authority (FT-id 8348).


WE HANDLE YOUR TAXES

We report all your trades to the Danish tax authorities so you don't have to.


YOU ARE COVERED BY THE GUARANTEE FUND

Your funds are safe with us. Cash is insured up to €100,000 in the event that we or a partner bank suspend payments. Your securities belong to you will be handed back to you in case something were to happen to Endavu.


Try investing, made refreshingly simple.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD
Få et hurtigt overblik over Sygeforsikringen ”danmark”s grupper og tilvalg, samt se hvilke tilskud du kan få.

Skatteguiden er dit automatiske skatteunivers, der hjælper dig med at få styr på din skat og spare penge gennem hele året.

Ved hjælp af en sikret adgang til Skattestyrelsens oplysninger og dine input, kan Skatteguiden hjælpe dig med undgå skattesmæk, finde glemte fradrag, tjekke årsopgørelsen før alle andre, og løbende holde styr på din indkomst. Hvis du er studerende, kan du også holde styr på, hvornår du tjener for meget ved siden af SU'en og undgå SU-smæk.

OM SKATTEGUIDEN
Skatteguiden er en højteknologisk virksomhed med ét enkelt formål - at gøre personlig skat nemt og overskueligt for os alle. Derfor har vi lavet dit automatiske skatteunivers, der giver dig ro omkring dine skatteforhold.

-

FORSKUDS TRACKER
Vi hjælper dig automatisk med at betale den rette skat og få de rette rentefradrag gennem hele året, således du ikke får et ubehageligt skattesmæk, men i stedet har ro omkring dine skatter.

TOPSKAT TRACKER
Få et løbende overblik over, hvor meget du har tjent ift. topskattegrænsen samt hvornår det kan give mening for dig, at indbetale mere til din pensionsordning for at opnå en skattebesparelse.

GLEMTE FRADRAG
Mange mennesker betaler for meget i skat, da ikke alle fradrag indberettes automatisk. Vi hjælper dig med at finde glemte fradrag op til 3 år tilbage i tid. Efterfølgende foretager vi indberetningen til Skattestyrelsen, så du får dine penge udbetalt direkte til din NemKonto.

SU TRACKER
Tjener man for meget ved siden af sin SU, risikerer man et SU-smæk og skal betale SU tilbage. Skatteguidens SU Tracker sammenholder dine løn- og SU-forhold løbende, så du kan undgå at betale SU tilbage. Alt sammen i et let tilgængeligt overblik.

INDKOMSTOVERBLIK
Hold løbende styr på, hvor meget du har tjent igennem året, hvad du betaler i skat, hvad du indbetaler til pension, hvornår du skal betale topskat og meget mere. Hele din indkomst samlet i ét simpelt overblik.

MIN SKAT I SAMFUNDET
Op imod 50% af din indkomst går til skat - men ved du reelt set, hvad dine skattekroner bruges på? Vi har bundet din skat sammen med de offentlige budgetter, så du kan se ned til sidste krone, hvad dine skattekroner er blevet brugt på.

TIDLIG ÅRSOPGØRELSE
Skatteguiden kan give dig et estimat af dit årsopgørelsesresultat op til 5 uger før Skat leverer den endelige årsopgørelse. Få et overblik over hvilket beløb du bør indbetale til Skat, for at spare renterne på en eventuel restskat. Vi leverer den endelige årsopgørelses PDF direkte i app'en.

https://www.skatteguiden.dk/dokument/persondatapolitik-app
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Danske Mobile Banking gives you overview and freedom to do your banking business independently of time and place. You also have easy access to a dialogue with us about financial decisions, big or small.


You can, for example

- pay bills and transfer money
- get an overview of your expenses, categorise them as you prefer and see everything in colour
- order our Pocket Money app and other products for children and young adults
- sign agreements digitally
- book meetings online
- get access to your payment accounts with other banks
- update your personal and contact information
- customise the account overview to suit your preferences
- get a full overview of your pension scheme with Danica Pension (subject to your consent)
- see an overview of your registered devices


We continue to develop the app and update it with new and exciting features.


Getting started is easy

1. Download the app
2. Log on using your MitId and create a PIN
3. You are ready to go


Have fun!

Nordnet's products and services are available in Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. With Nordnet's award-winning app, investing in stocks, funds, and ETFs is easier than ever. In the app you can track your progress and what is happening on the stock market. It's completely free to download and use the app.

• We offer trading in stocks, funds, and other securities at low fees on several of the world's largest exchanges.

• Discover new investments through top and theme lists, articles, and current campaigns.

• See discussions about investing and specific stocks and funds from our users.

• Follow your holdings and the stock market's development in real-time.



GET STARTED IN THREE MINUTES.

Create an account directly in the app. Deposit your money easily and secure to start trading and investing.



LOW FEES FOR TRADING AND INVESTING.

Always low fees regardless of how little or much you trade. Choose the commission class that fits your trading.



AUTOMATIC MONTHLY INVESTING.

Save automatically each month in funds. Get help choosing a fund plan that suits you.



WIDE RANGE OF STOCKS AND FUNDS.

Choose from thousands of stocks and funds on multiple exchanges around the world. Get inspired by other investors' stock holdings or choose funds based on your savings goals: sustainable, low fees, or highest returns.



REAL-TIME PRICE ALERTS.

Get a push notification when your watched stocks and other securities reach the level you have set.



WATCHLISTS.

Find your next investment through our watchlists. Choose industries that interest you and then get lists of instruments within those themes. Use it as inspiration to find new investments or to keep an eye on exciting companies. You can also create your own watchlists.



LISTEN AND READ REPORTS WITH QUARTR.

In partnership with Quartr, you can easily keep track of your favorite stocks by listening to company presentations during quarterly and annual reports. You can also download reports and presentations in text format.



INTERACTIVE GRAPHS.

Compare your investments with relevant indexes and see how you perform over time. See features for more advanced investors, such as trading volume and candlesticks.



SAFE AND EASY.

Log in with Touch-ID or Face-ID. Hide your balance if you, for example, want to log in in public environments.



ABOUT NORDNET.

We are a leading Nordic digital broker for savings and investments with over 2 million customers in Sweden, Finland, Norway, and Denmark.



Through innovation, simplicity, and transparency, we challenge traditional structures and give private savers access to the same information, tools, and services as professional investors. Welcome to Nordnet.

Welcome to Nordea!  

The app puts the entire bank in the palm of your hand, enabling you to do most of your banking swiftly, smoothly and securely.   

You can test the demo version of the app without logging in. You can access it through Menu before logging in. All information in the demo version is fictitious.  

Examples of what you can do in the app:  

YOUR OVERVIEW  
In the Overview tab, you can view and manage all your finances in one place. You can add, hide or rearrange the order of your content to personalise your experience. Quick actions take you straight to several functions, such as Search, helping you find what you need. If you have other banks, you can also add them to get a better overview of your finances.   

PAYMENTS AND TRANSFERS  
Pay your bills and transfer money, both between your own accounts or to a friend. Here, you can also add and manage direct debits, simplifying your everyday life.  

MANAGE YOUR CARDS  
Connect cards and wearables to Apple Pay for contactless payments. If you forgot your PIN-code, you can view it here. You can also block your card if needed, and we’ll send you a new one automatically. Choose the geographic areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting use for online shopping so you can feel safer and better control of your payments.   

SAVINGS AND INVESTMENTS  
It’s easy to keep track of your savings and see how they are performing. Start saving monthly, trade in funds and stocks, or set a goal for your savings. Get suggestions and ideas for new investments through Find Investments. 

DISCOVER NEW PRODUCTS AND SERVICES  
In the Services tab, you can open different accounts, apply for credit cards or loans, get digital advice for long-term savings, and much more.  

GET BETTER CONTROL OF YOUR FINANCES  
The Insights tab gives you a clear overview of your income and expenditure. Your spending is divided into categories to give you a deeper understanding where your money is going. Here, you can make your own budgets to make it easier to plan and keep track of your expenditure.  

WE'RE HERE FOR YOU   
The Help tab contains all the information you need to get help with your banking. Use the Search function, see frequently asked questions and answers, or chat with us directly. If you call us through the app, you’ve already identified yourself, so we can help you faster.  

We want to know what you think, so feel free to leave a review or send your feedback directly in the app.  

Download the app today and get access to all the functions that simplify your banking!

And much more

LUNAR - DENMARK

*The specific rate depends on your plan. Interest is variable, calculated annually, and paid out monthly. In order to receive interest, you’re required to have your NemKonto with us.
**Based on Lunar Business Simple, which was included in a comparison of first-year spending on business accounts in a survey by Samlino (2024).

*Applies to a separate savings account available with paid plans. Interest is variable, calculated annually, and paid out monthly.
**Lunar has made the comparison based on current offers as of 30/1-25 for equivalent business accounts with access to Bankgirotjänster. It is based on a compilation of fees for the first year at Swedish business banks in 2025. See the comparison below.

*Applies to paid plans. Interest is variable, calculated annually, and paid out monthly.
Mit PFA gives you a good overview, and it makes it easier to change and adjust your savings plan whenever needed.

SOMETIMES THINGS ARE UNNECESSARILY COMPLICATED
Life is charming. Especially when it hits you with bills and changes and leaves no room for your finances to keep up. Sounds familiar? Yeah, we thought it would.

AND SOMETIMES THEY’RE EASY
That’s why we’ve done our very best to create a new way of paying that accommodates just that. One that doesn’t require you to pay 100% of the price at checkout. One that lets you slice.

IN CASE THEY’RE NOT
Our team in customer service is happy to help you Monday to Thursday 8-17 and Fridays 8-15.

SHOP
A bed. A stroller. A new pair of shoes. Browse our partner shops, find your favorites, and fill your basket. 3000+ shoppers sign up/join our community every month. That’s not nothing.

AND SLICE
Proceed to checkout, slice your payment in 4, and chill. Our partner shops are paying for you to have that option. How’s that for customer service?

IT’S SIMPLE
Pay 25% today and 75% over the next three months, automatically. If for some reason, a pot of gold drops into your lap, you can make a manual payment and just be done with it.

BECAUSE
The Buy-Now-Pay-Later culture was getting a bit, yeah you know. And so we decided to shake things up a bit and see if we could do better. Turns out we could. We’ve developed a business model where shops pay a transaction fee of 3.95% as a service to their shoppers. As a result, shoppers pay nothing for paying in slices.

WE GOT YOU
We’ll remind you when it’s time to pay the next installment. We’ll make sure your account is updated with an overview of your payments. We’ll send you an email confirmation every time an order has been approved.

BIG TIME
Don’t take our word for it. We’re not the ones doing the shopping. Trust the reviews. That’s what we do.

Vil du have styr på dine penge? 

Med appen Lommebudget kan du nemt få overblik over, hvad du bruger dine penge på og hvor meget du har til resten af måneden. 
Appen er gratis. 

Med Lommebudget kan du fx:
• Få overblik over, hvad du bruger dine penge på ved at indtaste dine køb i appen og kategorisere dem.
• Nemt regne dit månedlige rådighedsbeløb ud 
• Oprette et budget for måneden og følge med i, om du holder dig inden for dit rådighedsbeløb
• Sætte påmindelser op - hvis du ønsker det

Dine data bliver kun gemt på din telefon. Lommebudget er gratis og kræver ingen oprettelse af brugerprofil eller login. Download appen – og du er i gang.

Appen er ejet af Forbrugerrådet Tænk. Læs mere om appen på tænk.dk/lommebudget
Forbrugerrådet Tænk er en medlemsorganisation og en NGO. Vi arbejder for, at det skal være trygt at være forbruger i Danmark.

Thousands of clients from over 55 countries have started their journey with us. You too can put your money to work.

Wahed is the easiest way to invest your money in an Ethical manner wherever you are. You can start with just $100 with no long-term commitments whatsoever. You can place a deposit or withdrawal request at anytime.

Here’s how it works:

1. Get a recommended portfolio based on your risk profile
2. Open your account and deposit seamlessly
3. Monitor your performance, we’ll buy the investments for you automatically

Start saving for your future with this award winning and revolutionary digital Ethical investment platform - your phone becomes an investment portfolio management tool.

Wahed’s robo-advisor custom tailors recommendations based on a simple risk assessment questionnaire with one main purpose: finding the right investment strategy for you! Your money will be invested in different funds such as global stocks, emerging market stocks, Sukuk, and gold.

Commitment to Ethical investing:

• Our investments are carefully screened for the presence of interest, as well securities with excessive debt ratios
• We do not invest in impermissible industries including alcohol, gambling, arms and tobacco, among others
• Our company and portfolios have been certified as Shariah Compliant by AAOIFI standards by our full time Shariah Review Board

Signing up is easy. Download our app, take the risk assessment questionnaire and make your deposit to join thousands of clients who are investing for their future.

Register your new bills with Betalingsservice. Manage your personal finances and avoid unpleasant reminder fees – our Betalingsservice app is a much better way to stay in control of your bills.
The Betalingsservice app is a one-stop app, allowing you to see all your payment agreements – anytime, anywhere. And it gives you a firm grip on your fixed expenses, such as rent, fitness, TV subscriptions, utilities, loans, donations, mobile subscription.
You don’t need to be a customer of a particular bank. You can use the Betalingsservice app if you have a Danish civil registration number (CPR), a Danish bank account with a Betalingsservice agreement and a MitID.

GET BETALINGSSERVICE – ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
•	See which bills you have paid and which are still to be paid
•	See all of your standing order payments – covers all your accounts
•	Register your bills for automated payment – it’s fast and easy
•	Receive push notifications regarding your payments and mandates

REGISTER YOUR BILLS FOR AUTOMATED PAYMENT – IT’S FAST AND EASY
•	Scan the QR code on the bill – sign up in less than 2 minutes
•	Receive push notifications when mandates have been approved

ONE-STOP APP FOR ALL YOUR PAYMENTS AND AGREEMENTS
•	See all your previous payments, month by month, going back several years
•	See current status and details on each individual payment
•	See all of your standing order payments

GET AN INSTANT OVERVIEW OF ALL YOUR REGULAR EXPENSES
•	You can list all your expenses during the year
•	See how your expenses break down into your home, consumption, charity donations, utilities, insurance, unemployment insurance fees, transport, children, tuition, entertainment, media, health, loans, sports and membership fees
•	Set up a budget and monitor your expenses, year by year

EXTRA SECURITY AND SECURITY CODE OF YOUR OWN CHOICE
MitID is required the first time you use the Betalingsservice app. After that, you can log on using a four-digit PIN of your own choice.
In order to use the app, you must have the following:
•	A valid Danish civil registration number (CPR)
•	A Danish bank account with a Betalingsservice agreement
•	MitID
Use MitID to access your payment information. MitID is your assurance that you only have access to your own data. Any data you key into the app will be sent in encrypted form to Betalingsservice.

RESTRICTIONS FOR JOINT ACCOUNTS
If your Betalingsservice agreements are related to a bank account that you share with others, such as your spouse, you may not have full access to all payment data.

INFORMATION AND SETTINGS
The settings menu lets you see and edit your account, push notifications and your personal information. It also contains terms and conditions and frequently asked questions.
If you have any suggestions for improvements, we’d love to hear from you. Write to us at www.facebook.com/Betalingsservice.

In Resurs app we have gathered everything that you as customer might need. Get a full overview of your various accounts, handle your payments and utilize different campaigns and discounts. In our app you can also manage the settings for your card, e.g., activate or de-activate contactless payments or internet purchases and change your PIN-code. If questions arise along the way, you can chat with our customer support inside the app. Everything gathered, in one safe place.

The app in short:

* You get a full overview of your accounts
* You can keep track of your balances
* Fast and simple payments
* Pay things your way
* Manage your card settings
* Access to rapid and professional service, chat with our customer support

We are constantly working to improve the app and your experience. This version contains more improvements and fewer bugs. Update to get the most out of your Resurs app!

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Mobilbank fra Jyske Bank med personlig forside og nem adgang til dét, der er vigtigt for dig.


• Skriv til os og få svar direkte i app’en
• Nem økonomi i hverdagen - betal, overfør, tjek konto mm.
• Find dine beskeder og dokumenter fra banken
• Investeringer – køb, sælg og få overblik
• Bolig – tjek dit lån og mulighederne for at ændre på lånet
• Kontobevægelser opdelt i kategorier
• Direkte adgang til PensionsInfo


Vi arbejder hele tiden på at give dig endnu flere muligheder i mobilbanken. De kommer løbende, når du opdaterer din app. Senere bliver netbank og mobilbank samlet, så du kan møde det samme personlige indhold og de samme funktioner, uanset om du logger på via computer, telefon eller tablet. Det skal sikre, at vores digitale platform følger med vores kunders stigende ønske om at løse hverdagens bankforretninger selv.


OBS: Du skal være kunde i Jyske Bank for at bruge mobilbanken. Når du logger på første gang, skal du bruge MitID.

Young Money er et digitalt penge- og opsparingsunivers til børn og unge i alderen 7-17 år… og deres forældre!
 
Med appen får børn, unge og deres forældre mulighed for at let at følge indtægter, opsparingsmål og forbrug på en nem og sikker måde. Sprog og funktioner i appen tilpasses automatisk til brugerens alder, og vil derfor variere afhængig af om du eksempelvis er 7, 13 eller 17 år.
 
Både forældre og barn skal være kunde i én af de banker der tilbyder Young Money.
Som 7-17 årig kan man:
- Altid se hvor mange penge man har og følge sit forbrug
- Anmode sin forælder om penge
- Overføre penge til forælder
- Se beløb der kan tjenes ved at løse faste- og enkeltstående opgaver fra forælder
- Holde styr på hvad man skylder andre og andre skylder dig
 
- Løbende se beskeder med indsigter på baggrund af ens handlinger
- Se hvor mange penge der er gået ind og ud, og dermed forståelse for de penge der er tilbage på kontoen
- Oprette, rette og prioritere sine opsparingsmål
- Beregne hvornår det er realistisk at nå sit opsparingsmål
- Vælge avatar eller uploade egne billeder på sin profil
- Modtage pengegaver fra sin forælder
- Se om ens forælder har opsat ekstra incitament ved fuldført opsparingsmål
- Opnå høj streakscore, når man følger med i sin økonomi
 
Som forælder kan man:
- Følge sit barns forbrug og opsparingsmål
- Overføre penge til sit barn
- Oprette faste- og enkelstående opgaver til sit barn
- Give sit barns opsparingsmål et boost, så man styrker incitament til at forfølge mål og bruge pengene rigtigt
- Sende pengegaver til sit barn (inkl. mulighed for fysisk pengegave)
- Modtage penge fra sit barn
- Modtage løbende infobeskeder med indsigter og påkrævede handlinger
 
Download Young Money-appen i dag og få gang i de gode dialoger om sunde pengevaner i hjemmet og få et godt fundament for en god pengeforståelse.
 
Du kan bestille og læse mere om Young Money på www.youngmoney.dk.

Valuta+ – Currency Converter & Exchange Rate App

A simple currency converter app with a sleek Danish design. Instantly convert exchange rates with a fast, intuitive conversion calculator, perfect for travel, shopping, finance, and everyday use. 

Supporting over 170 global currencies, including USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, and more, Valuta+ helps you stay on top of the latest forex rates and currency values.

Why users love this app:
"Perfect for my travels – so easy to convert multiple currencies with live rates!"

Top Features:
- 170+ currencies worldwide: Convert between USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, INR, and more
- Works offline: Access recent exchange rate data without an internet connection
- Favorite currencies list: Quickly access your most-used conversions
- Real-time accuracy: Automatic updates with trusted interbank exchange rates
- Rate adjustment: Factor in ATM and bank exchange fees for more realistic conversions
- Simple, clean interface: Designed for speed, clarity, and smooth navigation
- Currency converter for travelers: Ideal for international trips and business use
- Supports popular conversions like yen to USD, pesos to dollars, and more

Whether you're managing expenses, comparing prices abroad, or need a reliable money exchange app, Valuta+ is your go-to tool for fast, accurate, and stress-free currency conversion.

Valuta+ uses neutral interbank rates. No hidden fees or bank markups, just honest conversions.
